nodes.text: Sergeant Kobbeth was a Twi'lek male who served the Galactic Republic's military. He was stationed on Belsavis during the Galactic War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The sergeant's wife and son, Trea and Viyo Kobbeth lived on the planet Tython, as part of the Pilgrims who inhabited Kalikori village. While searching Rakata vaults, Kobbeth encountered an individual associated with the Sith Empire, who saved him and Corporal Rand from an Esh-kha assault in exchange for a vault key.
Kobbeth was the husband of the Twi'lek Pilgrim Trea Kobbeth and father to Viyo Kobbeth.
